alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:31PM EDT until July 21 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CHESHIRE COUNTY... At 530 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Windsor to Richmond, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Keene, Jaffrey, Swanzey, Peterborough, Winchester, Antrim, Dublin, Richmond, Harrisville, Nelson, Marlborough, Rindge, Hinsdale, Roxbury, Fitzwilliam, Troy, Sullivan, Chesterfield, Gilsum and Windsor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
